cards.name: Ariel
cards.cardText:
VOICELESS This character can't {E} to sing songs.

"..."

cards.name: Ariel
cards.cardText:
Singer 5 (This character counts as cost 5 to sing songs.)
MUSICAL DEBUT When you play this character, look at the top 4 cards of your deck. You may reveal a song card and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

cards.name: Cinderella
cards.cardText:
Singer 5 (This character counts as cost 5 to sing songs.)
A WONDERFUL DREAM {E} — Remove up to 3 damage from chosen Princess character.

cards.name: Goofy
cards.cardText:
Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)
AND TWO FOR TEA! When you play this character, you may remove up to 2 damage from each of your Musketeer characters.

"En gawrsh!"

cards.name: Hades
cards.cardText:
Shift 6 (You may pay 6 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Hades.)
SINISTER PLOT This character gets +1 {L} for each other Villain character you have in play.

"Oh hey, I'm gonna need new business cards."

cards.name: Hades
cards.cardText:
WELL OF SOULS When you play this character, return a character card from your discard to your hand.

"Production is up, costs are down, the rivers are full. Time to talk expansion."

cards.name: HeiHei
cards.cardText:
Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {S} to another chosen character's {S} this turn.)

"Sometimes, our strengths lie beneath the surface. Far beneath, in some cases...."
—Moana

cards.name: LeFou
cards.cardText:
LOYAL If you have a character named Gaston in play, you pay 1 {I} less to play this character.

You need a good toady to be a proper bad guy.

cards.name: Lilo
cards.cardText: "A falling star... I have to make a wish!"

cards.name: Maximus
cards.cardText:
Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)
Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {S} to another chosen character's {S} this turn.)

cards.name: Maximus
cards.cardText:
HORSE KICK When you play this character, chosen character gets -2 {S} this turn.

He pursues his quarry with courage, discipline, and a touch of class.

cards.name: Mickey Mouse
cards.cardText: As long as he's around, newcomers to the Great Illuminary will always get a warm welcome.

cards.name: Minnie Mouse
cards.cardText: Wherever the princess goes, her musketeers are... well, they're around somewhere, probably.

cards.name: Moana
cards.cardText:
WE CAN FIX IT Whenever this character quests, you may ready your other Princess characters. They can't quest for the rest of this turn.

"I am Moana of Motunui. You will board my boat, sail across the sea, and restore the heart of Te Fiti."

cards.name: Mr. Smee
cards.cardText:
"Mr. Smee is a kind, gentle soul who lives to bring comfort and aid to a twisted old villain. Now, what good is kindness like that?"
—Peter Pan

cards.name: Prince Phillip
cards.cardText:
HEROISM When this character challenges and is banished, you may banish the challenged character.

"The road to true love may be barred by still many more dangers, which you alone will have to face."
—Flora

cards.name: Pumbaa
cards.cardText: "You gotta put your behind in your past."

cards.name: Rapunzel
cards.cardText: GLEAM AND GLOW When you play this character, remove up to 3 damage from one of your characters. Draw a card for each 1 damage removed this way.

cards.name: Sebastian
cards.cardText:
Singer 4 (This character counts as cost 4 to sing songs.)

"I should be writing symphonies, not tagging along after some headstrong teenager."

cards.name: Simba
cards.cardText:
Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)

Courage comes in all sizes.

cards.name: Stitch
cards.cardText:
OHANA When you play this character, if you have 2 or more other characters in play, you may draw 2 cards.

"So you're from outer space, huh? I hear the surfing's choice."
—David

cards.name: Stitch
cards.cardText:
Lilo: "David! I got a new dog!"
David: "Auwe!...You sure it's a dog?"
Lilo: "Uh-huh. He used to be a collie before he got ran over."

cards.name: Stitch
cards.cardText:
Shift 4 (You may pay 4 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Stitch.)
ADORING FANS Whenever you play a character with cost 2 or less, you may exert them to draw a card.

The best part about a beachside concert is that there's always room for one more.

cards.name: Timon
cards.cardText:
TASTES LIKE CHICKEN When you play this character, you may remove up to 1 damage from chosen character.

"There's all manner of tasty treats in the world—ya just gotta know where to look."

cards.name: Be Our Guest
cards.cardText:
(A character with cost 2 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.)
Look at the top 4 cards of your deck. You may reveal a character card and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

cards.name: Control Your Temper!
cards.cardText: Chosen character gets -2 {S} this turn.

cards.name: Hakuna Matata
cards.cardText:
(A character with cost 4 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.)
Remove up to 3 damage from each of your characters.

What a wonderful phrase!

cards.name: Healing Glow
cards.cardText:
Remove up to 2 damage from chosen character.

"Don't freak out!"
—Rapunzel

cards.name: Just in Time
cards.cardText:
You may play a character with cost 5 or less for free.

The best heroes always arrive at the perfect moment—whether they know it or not.

cards.name: Part of Your World
cards.cardText:
(A character with cost 3 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.)
Return a character card from your discard to your hand.

What would I give
If I could live out of these waters?

cards.name: You Have Forgotten Me
cards.cardText:
Each opponent chooses and discards 2 cards.

"You are more than what you have become."
—Mufasa

cards.name: Dinglehopper
cards.cardText:
STRAIGHTEN HAIR {E} — Remove up to 1 damage from chosen character.

Enjoy the finest of human hairstyles!

cards.name: Lantern
cards.cardText:
BIRTHDAY LIGHTS {E} — You pay 1 {I} less for the next character you play this turn.

Lanterns fill the sky on one special night, beacons of hope and love.

cards.name: Ursula's Shell Necklace
cards.cardText:
NOW, SING! Whenever you play a song, you may pay 1 {I} to draw a card.

"Singing is a lovely pastime...if you've got the voice for it."
—Ursula

cards.name: Anna
cards.cardText:
LOVING HEART When you play this character, if you have a character named Elsa in play, choose an opposing character. The chosen character doesn't ready at the start of their next turn.

"Two sisters, one mind."

cards.name: Archimedes
cards.cardText: "Flying is not merely some crude, mechanical process. It is a delicate art. Purely aesthetic. Poetry of motion. And the best way to learn it is to do it!"

cards.name: Dr. Facilier
cards.cardText:
Shift 5 (You may pay 5 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Dr. Facilier.)
INTO THE SHADOWS Whenever one of your other characters is banished in a challenge, you may return that card to your hand.

cards.name: Dr. Facilier
cards.cardText:
Challenger +2 (While challenging, this character gets +2 {S}.)

"Enchantée. A tip of the hat from Dr. Facilier."

cards.name: Dr. Facilier
cards.cardText: DREAMS MADE REAL Whenever you play a song, you may look at the top 2 cards of your deck. Put one on the top of your deck and the other on the bottom.

cards.name: Elsa
cards.cardText: "I never knew what I was capable of."

cards.name: Elsa
cards.cardText:
FREEZE {E} — Exert chosen opposing character.

Recreated by magical ink, Elsa found herself in an entirely new world. Fortunately, ice works the same way everywhere.

cards.name: Elsa
cards.cardText:
Shift 6 (You may pay 6 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Elsa.)
DEEP FREEZE When you play this character, exert up to 2 chosen characters. They can't ready at the start of their next turn.

Ice is stronger than you may think.

cards.name: Flotsam
cards.cardText:
Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.)
DEXTEROUS LUNGE Your characters named Jetsam gain Rush.

"We know someone who can help you... for a price."

cards.name: Jafar
cards.cardText:
HIDDEN WONDERS This character gets +1 {S} for each card in your hand.

There's more than one way to bury secrets.

cards.name: Jafar
cards.cardText:
Challenger +3 (While challenging, this character gets +3 {S}.)

"Enough skulking about. It's time to show that sniveling sultan what a sorcerer can do."

cards.name: Jetsam
cards.cardText:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
SINISTER SLITHER Your characters named Flotsam gain Evasive.

"We can help you get anything you want...."

cards.name: Magic Broom
cards.cardText:
SWEEP When you play this character, you may shuffle a card from any discard into its player's deck.

In the immense story-forge known as the Great Illuminary, there is always work to be done.

cards.name: Maleficent
cards.cardText: "One mustn't rush these things, or the greatest plan might come to nothing."

cards.name: Maleficent
cards.cardText:
CAST MY SPELL! When you play this character, you may draw a card.

"You dare challenge me? Fool, my magic is more powerful than you could possibly imagine!"

cards.name: Marshmallow
cards.cardText:
DURABLE When this character is banished in a challenge, you may return this card to your hand.

"Hey! We were just talking about you! All good things, all good things."
—Olaf

cards.name: Mickey Mouse
cards.cardText:
ANIMATE BROOM You pay 1 {I} less to play Broom characters.
CEASELESS WORKER Whenever one of your Broom characters is banished in a challenge, you may return that card to your hand.

He always goes for the clean sweep.

cards.name: Olaf
cards.cardText: "I'm Olaf and I like warm hugs!"

cards.name: Pascal
cards.cardText:
CAMOUFLAGE While you have another character in play, this character gains Evasive. (Only characters with Evasive can challenge them.)

A true friend is always there for you, whether you can see them or not.

cards.name: Rafiki
cards.cardText:
Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.)

"The past can hurt. But the way I see it, you can either run from it or learn from it."

cards.name: Sven
cards.cardText:
"Reindeer comin' through!"
—Kristoff

cards.name: The Queen
cards.cardText:
I SUMMON THEE {E} — Draw a card.

Sublime beauty matched with peerless cunning. Is there any question who is fairest?

cards.name: The Wardrobe
cards.cardText: When you simply must have the hautest couture.

cards.name: Tinker Bell
cards.cardText:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
LOYAL AND DEVOTED Your characters named Peter Pan gain Challenger +1. (They get +1 {S} while challenging.)

cards.name: Ursula
cards.cardText:
IT'S TOO EASY! When you play this character, each opponent loses 1 lore. You may draw a card for each 1 lore lost this way.

The first Rule of Villainy: If you're going to be evil, you've got to have style.

cards.name: Yzma
cards.cardText:
YOU'RE EXCUSED Whenever this character quests, look at the top card of your deck. Put it on either the top or the bottom of your deck.

"When I want your opinion, I will give it to you!"

cards.name: Zeus
cards.cardText:
Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.)
Challenger +4 (While challenging, this character gets +4 {S}.)

"A little lightning solves a whole lot of problems."

cards.name: Befuddle
cards.cardText:
Return a character or item with cost 2 or less to their player's hand.

Never be afraid to have your mind boggled now and then.

cards.name: Freeze
cards.cardText:
Exert chosen opposing character.

It's time for you to chill.

cards.name: Friends on the Other Side
cards.cardText:
(A character with cost 3 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.)
Draw 2 cards.

The cards, the cards
the cards will tell...

cards.name: Reflection
cards.cardText:
(A character with cost 1 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.)
Look at the top 3 cards of your deck. Put them back on the top of your deck in any order.

When will my reflection show
Who I am inside?

cards.name: Magic Mirror
cards.cardText:
SPEAK! {E}, 4 {I} — Draw a card.

"What wouldst thou know, my Queen?"

cards.name: Ursula's Cauldron
cards.cardText:
PEER INTO THE DEPTHS {E} — Look at the top 2 cards of your deck. Put one on the top of your deck and the other on the bottom.

Perfect for mixing potions and stealing voices.

cards.name: White Rabbit's Pocket Watch
cards.cardText:
I'M LATE! {E}, 1 {I} — Chosen character gains Rush this turn. (They can challenge the turn they're played.)

"No wonder you're late. Why, this watch is exactly two days slow." —The Mad Hatter

cards.name: Aladdin
cards.cardText:
Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)

Fabulously wealthy. Practically untouchable. Genuinely inauthentic.

cards.name: Beast
cards.cardText:
Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.)
ROAR When you play this character, exert all opposing damaged characters.

"I'll take on all of you if I have to!"

cards.name: Cheshire Cat
cards.cardText:
LOSE SOMETHING? When this character is challenged and banished, banish the challenging character.

"You may have noticed that I'm not all there myself."

cards.name: Cruella De Vil
cards.cardText:
YOU'LL BE SORRY! When this character is challenged and banished, you may return chosen character to their player's hand.

When she stops by, misery is company.

cards.name: Duke of Weselton
cards.cardText: "Sorcery! I knew there was something dubious going on here."

cards.name: Flynn Rider
cards.cardText:
HERE COMES THE SMOLDER Whenever this character is challenged, the challenging player chooses and discards a card.

"I didn't want to have to do this, but you leave me no choice...."

cards.name: Genie
cards.cardText:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
DISAPPEAR When you play this character, you may return chosen character to their player's hand.

"Can your friends go 'Abracadabra, let 'er rip' and then make the sucker disappear?"

cards.name: Genie
cards.cardText:
Shift 6 (You may pay 6 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Genie.)
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
PHENOMENAL COSMIC POWER! Whenever this character quests, you may play an action with cost 5 or less for free.

cards.name: Genie
cards.cardText: "You can wish for nearly anything! Do you want the short version, or should I give you the whole song and dance?"

cards.name: Hans
cards.cardText: "Rules are like older siblings. All they do is get in the way."

cards.name: Horace
cards.cardText: "Well, they ain't in here, Jasper."

cards.name: Iago
cards.cardText: YOU GOT A PROBLEM? {E} — Chosen character gains Reckless during their next turn. (They can't quest and must challenge if able.)

cards.name: Jasper
cards.cardText:
PUPPYNAPPING Whenever this character quests, chosen opposing character can't quest during their next turn.

"Now, look here, Horace, I warned you about thinkin'."

cards.name: John Silver
cards.cardText:
PICK YOUR FIGHTS When you play this character and whenever he quests, chosen opposing character gains Reckless during their next turn. (They can't quest and must challenge if able.)

"Don't be too put off by this... hunk of hardware."

cards.name: Jumba Jookiba
cards.cardText: "Created something? Ha! But that would be irresponsible and unethical. I would never, ever... make more than one."

cards.name: Kuzco
cards.cardText:
Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)
NO TOUCHY! When this character is challenged and banished, you may banish the challenging character.

"I asked for emerald and that is clearly jade! What is wrong with you people?"

cards.name: Lady Tremaine
cards.cardText:
DO IT AGAIN! When you play this character, you may return an action card from your discard to your hand.

"If your chores are done, then clearly you don't have enough of them."

cards.name: Mad Hatter
cards.cardText:
TEA PARTY Whenever this character is challenged, you may draw a card.

Mad Hatter: "Would you like a little more tea?"
Alice: "I haven't had any yet, so I can't very well take more."

cards.name: Megara
cards.cardText:
WONDER BOY When you play this character, chosen character gets +2 {S} this turn.

"A deal's a deal. But falling in love was never supposed to be part of it."

cards.name: Mickey Mouse
cards.cardText:
Shift 5 (You may pay 5 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Mickey Mouse.)
MISDIRECTION Whenever you play an action, chosen opposing character can't quest during their next turn.

Quiet as a... well, you know.

cards.name: Mickey Mouse
cards.cardText: On rivers throughout the Inklands, the little steamboat's whistle answers the cheery tunes of its pilot.

cards.name: Mother Gothel
cards.cardText:
SKIP THE DRAMA, STAY WITH MAMA While this character is exerted, opposing characters can't quest.

"Great. Now I'm the bad guy."

cards.name: Peter Pan
cards.cardText:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

"What's the matter, Hook? Can't you fly?"

cards.name: Tamatoa
cards.cardText: "Someday, I'll grow up to be the most crabulous crustacean the world has ever seen!"

cards.name: Tinker Bell
cards.cardText:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
PIXIE DUST When you play this character, chosen character gains Evasive this turn.

cards.name: Do It Again!
cards.cardText:
Return an action card from your discard to your hand.

"...Then scrub the terrace, sweep the halls and the stairs, clean the chimneys. And of course there's the mending, and the sewing, and the laundry..."
—Lady Tremaine

cards.name: Mother Knows Best
cards.cardText:
(A character with cost 3 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.)
Return chosen character to their player's hand.

One way or another
Something will go wrong, I swear

cards.name: Stampede
cards.cardText:
Deal 2 damage to chosen damaged character.

A wildebeest stampede is like a raging river: best experienced from a distance.

cards.name: Steal from the Rich
cards.cardText:
Whenever one of your characters quests this turn, each opponent loses 1 lore.

"Wonder how much ol' Prince John spent on all those fancy locks."
—Little John

cards.name: Sudden Chill
cards.cardText:
(A character with cost 2 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.)
Each opponent chooses and discards a card.

Cruella De Vil, Cruella De Vil
If she doesn't scare you, no evil thing will

cards.name: The Beast is Mine!
cards.cardText:
Chosen character gains Reckless during their next turn. (They can't quest and must challenge if able.)

"It's only fitting that the finest hunter gets the foulest beast!"
—Gaston

cards.name: Vicious Betrayal
cards.cardText:
Chosen character gets +2 {S} this turn. If a Villain character is chosen, they get +3 {S} instead.

"A true king takes matters into his own claws."
—Scar

cards.name: Dr. Facilier's Cards
cards.cardText:
THE CARDS WILL TELL {E} — You pay 1 {I} less for the next action you play this turn.

"Take a little trip into your future with me!"
—Dr. Facilier

cards.name: Stolen Scimitar
cards.cardText:
SLASH {E} — Chosen character gets +1 {S} this turn. If a character named Aladdin is chosen, he gets +2 {S} instead.

Sometimes you've got to take what you can get.

cards.name: Abu
cards.cardText:
"Someday, Abu, things are gonna change. We'll be rich, live in a palace, and never have any problems at all."
—Aladdin

cards.name: Aladdin
cards.cardText:
Shift 5 (You may pay 5 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Aladdin.)
DARING EXPLOIT During your turn, whenever this character banishes another character in a challenge, you gain 2 lore and each opponent loses 2 lore.

cards.name: Aladdin
cards.cardText:
IMPROVISE When you play this character, each opponent loses 1 lore.

It can be hard to tell the difference between a diamond in the rough and someone who's just, well, rough.

cards.name: Captain
cards.cardText: "Barking signal. It's an alert. Report to the Colonel at once!"

cards.name: Captain Hook
cards.cardText:
Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.)
YOU COWARD! While this character is exerted, opposing characters with Evasive gain Reckless. (They can't quest and must challenge if able.)

"You wouldn't dare fight old Hook man-to-man!"

cards.name: Donald Duck
cards.cardText: "Who you callin' boisterous, buster?"

cards.name: Elsa
cards.cardText:
THAT'S NO BLIZZARD Whenever you play a character named Anna, ready this character. This character can't quest for the rest of this turn.

"My sister has always been there for me. I need to be there for her."

cards.name: Gaston
cards.cardText:
Reckless (This character can't quest and must challenge each turn if able.)

It's not arrogance when you really are the best.

cards.name: Goofy
cards.cardText:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

Sometimes you gotta give it the ol' jump and hyuck.

cards.name: LeFou
cards.cardText:
FAN THE FLAMES When you play this character, ready chosen character. They can't quest for the rest of this turn.

All a mob needs is a push in the wrong direction.

cards.name: Maleficent
cards.cardText:
DRAGON FIRE When you play this character, you may banish chosen character.

The ninth Rule of Villainy: When all else fails, turn into a dragon.

cards.name: Maui
cards.cardText:
Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.)
Reckless (This character can't quest and must challenge each turn if able.)

"What I believe you were trying to say is 'Thank you.'"

cards.name: Mickey Mouse
cards.cardText:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

When defeat looms and victory hangs by a thread, a hero bolts to the rescue, patching things up through shear determination.

cards.name: Minnie Mouse
cards.cardText: Her fashion sense is always spot on.

cards.name: Moana
cards.cardText:
THIS IS NOT WHO YOU ARE When you play this character, you may banish chosen character named Te Kā.

"You know who you are."

cards.name: Mulan
cards.cardText: LEAD BY EXAMPLE During your turn, whenever this character banishes another character in a challenge, your other characters get +1 {L} this turn.

cards.name: Peter Pan
cards.cardText:
Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.)

"Nobody calls Pan a coward and lives! I'll fight you man-to-man, with one hand behind my back."

cards.name: Pongo
cards.cardText:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

"At first I had no particular plan, just anything to attract attention. You know, stir things up a bit."

cards.name: Rapunzel
cards.cardText:
TANGLE When you play this character, each opponent loses 1 lore.

"Who are you? And how did you find me?"

cards.name: Scar
cards.cardText: Consumed by the flames of ambition.

cards.name: Scar
cards.cardText:
Shift 6 (You may pay 6 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Scar.)
ROUSING SPEECH When you play this character, ready your characters with cost 3 or less. They can't quest for the rest of this turn.

"The time has come to take what is ours!"

cards.name: Sergeant Tibbs
cards.cardText: "Yes, sir. Righto, sir. Right away, sir!"

cards.name: Stitch
cards.cardText:
"His destructive programming is taking effect. He will be irresistibly drawn to large cities, where he will back up sewers, reverse street signs, and steal everyone's left shoe."
—Jumba Jookiba

cards.name: Te Kā
cards.cardText:
Reckless (This character can't quest and must challenge each turn if able.)

She burns for that which was stolen from her.

cards.name: Tigger
cards.cardText:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

"I'm the bounciest bouncer that ever bounced!"

cards.name: Be Prepared
cards.cardText:
(A character with cost 7 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.)
Banish all characters.

Our teeth and ambitions are bared!

cards.name: Cut to the Chase
cards.cardText:
Chosen character gains Rush this turn. (They can challenge the turn they're played.)

"Surprise!"

cards.name: Dragon Fire
cards.cardText:
Banish chosen character.

Rare is the hero who can withstand a dragon's wrath.

cards.name: Fan the Flames
cards.cardText:
Ready chosen character. They can't quest for the rest of this turn.

Pretty words can move a crowd, but so can ugly ones.

cards.name: He's Got a Sword!
cards.cardText:
Chosen character gets +2 {S} this turn.

"We've all got swords!"
—Razoul

cards.name: Tangle
cards.cardText:
Each opponent loses 1 lore.

"Stay right there! I mean, you don't have a choice, I guess. But still! Don't move!"
—Rapunzel

cards.name: Poisoned Apple
cards.cardText:
TAKE A BITE... 1 {I}, Banish this item — Exert chosen character. If a Princess character is chosen, banish her instead.

"One taste of the poisoned apple, and the victim's eyes will close forever...."
—The Queen

cards.name: Shield of Virtue
cards.cardText:
FIREPROOF {E}, 3 {I} — Ready chosen character. They can't quest for the rest of this turn.

"Arm thyself with this enchanted Shield of Virtue and this mighty Sword of Truth, for these weapons of righteousness will triumph over evil." —Flora

cards.name: Sword of Truth
cards.cardText:
FINAL ENCHANTMENT Banish this item — Banish chosen Villain character.

Almost as powerful as True Love's Kiss.

cards.name: Ariel
cards.cardText:
LOOK AT THIS STUFF Whenever you play an item, you may ready this character.

"You want thingamabobs? I got twenty."

cards.name: Aurora
cards.cardText:
DISARMING BEAUTY When you play this character, chosen character gets -2 {S} this turn.

"There was something strange about that voice. Too beautiful to be real..."
—Prince Phillip

cards.name: Aurora
cards.cardText:
Shift 3 (You may pay 3 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Aurora.)
PROTECTIVE EMBRACE Your other characters gain Ward. (Opponents can't choose them except to challenge.)

As the princess slumbered, her power awoke.

cards.name: Aurora
cards.cardText: "They say if you dream a thing more than once, it's sure to come true!"

cards.name: Belle
cards.cardText:
TINKER Whenever this character quests, you pay 1 {I} less for the next item you play this turn.

A little ingenuity and a lot of heart will take you far in this world.

cards.name: Belle
cards.cardText:
READ A BOOK During your turn, you may put an additional card from your hand into your inkwell facedown.
MY FAVORITE PART! While you have 10 or more cards in your inkwell, this character gets +4 {L}.

"Far-off places, daring sword fights, magic spells, a prince in disguise..."

cards.name: Chief Tui
cards.cardText:
Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {S} to another chosen character's {S} this turn.)

"You can always rely on the strength of those who love you."

cards.name: Donald Duck
cards.cardText:
Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)

Walk smarter, not harder.

cards.name: Flounder
cards.cardText: "Excitement... adventure... danger lurking around every cor— AAAAAGGH!"

cards.name: Gramma Tala
cards.cardText:
I WILL BE WITH YOU When this character is banished, you may put this card into your inkwell facedown and exerted.

Moana: "Is there something you want to tell me?"
Gramma Tala: "Is there something you want to hear?"

cards.name: Hades
cards.cardText:
IS THERE A DOWNSIDE TO THIS? When you play this character, you may put chosen opposing character into their player's inkwell facedown.

"He's gotta have a weakness, because everybody's got a weakness."

cards.name: Jasmine
cards.cardText: "Try to understand. I've never done a thing on my own. I've never had any real friends.... I've never even been outside the palace walls."

cards.name: Jasmine
cards.cardText:
Shift 3 (You may pay 3 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Jasmine.)
CARETAKER When you play this character and whenever she quests, you may remove up to 2 damage from each of your characters.

cards.name: Maleficent
cards.cardText: "The princess shall indeed grow in grace and beauty, beloved by all who know her. But before the sun sets on her sixteenth birthday, she shall prick her finger on the spindle of a spinning wheel...."

cards.name: Maleficent
cards.cardText: She had no invitation—and needed no introduction.

cards.name: Maurice
cards.cardText:
GIVE IT A TRY Whenever this character quests, you pay 2 {I} less for the next item you play this turn.
IT WORKS! Whenever you play an item, you may draw a card.

cards.name: Merlin
cards.cardText:
Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {S} to another chosen character's {S} this turn.)

"What a mess! What a medieval muddle! We'll have to modernize it."

cards.name: Mickey Mouse
cards.cardText:
GET A CLUE When you play this character, you may put the top card of your deck into your inkwell facedown and exerted.

Wherever the seaweed had come from, Mickey was sure of one thing: something fishy was going on.

cards.name: Mufasa
cards.cardText: "A king must care for all of the creatures in his kingdom, no matter their size."

cards.name: Philoctetes
cards.cardText:
Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {S} to another chosen character's {S} this turn.)

"Ya gotta be the best to train the best. And I train the best!"

cards.name: Robin Hood
cards.cardText:
FEED THE POOR When you play this character, if an opponent has more cards in their hand than you, draw a card.
GOOD SHOT During your turn, this character gains Evasive. (They can challenge characters with Evasive.)

"We never rob. We just sort of borrow a bit from those who can afford it."

cards.name: Scar
cards.cardText:
INSIDIOUS PLOT When you play this character, chosen opposing character gets -5 {S} this turn.

"The best plans involve a little danger. Just not for me."

cards.name: Tamatoa
cards.cardText:
WHAT HAVE WE HERE? When you play this character and whenever he quests, you may return an item card from your discard to your hand.
GLAM This character gets +1 {L} for each item you have in play.

"Watch me dazzle like a diamond in the rough!"

cards.name: Triton
cards.cardText: "Isn't 'Because I said so' enough of a reason?"

cards.name: Develop Your Brain
cards.cardText:
Look at the top 2 cards of your deck. Put one into your hand and the other on the bottom of the deck.

"Knowledge, wisdom—there's the real power!"
—Merlin

cards.name: If it's Not Baroque
cards.cardText:
Return an item card from your discard to your hand.

"...Don't fix it."

cards.name: Let It Go
cards.cardText:
(A character with cost 5 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.)
Put chosen character into their player's inkwell facedown and exerted.

It's time to see what I can do
To test the limits and break through

cards.name: One Jump Ahead
cards.cardText:
(A character with cost 2 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.)
Put the top card of your deck into your inkwell facedown and exerted.

Gotta eat to live, gotta steal to eat—
Tell you all about it when I got the time

cards.name: Work Together
cards.cardText:
Chosen character gains Support this turn. (Whenever they quest, you may add their {S} to another chosen character's {S} this turn.)

Pacha: "Put your whole back into it!"
Kuzco: "This is my whole back!"

cards.name: Coconut Basket
cards.cardText:
CONSIDER THE COCONUT Whenever you play a character, you may remove up to 2 damage from chosen character.

The coconut is a versatile gift from the gods, used to make nearly everything—including baskets to carry more coconuts.

cards.name: Eye of the Fates
cards.cardText:
SEE THE FUTURE {E} — Chosen character gets +1 {L} this turn.

You can change the future once you know what you're looking at.

cards.name: Fishbone Quill
cards.cardText:
GO AHEAD AND SIGN {E} — Put any card from your hand into your inkwell facedown.

"If you want to cross the bridge, my sweet, you've got to pay the toll."
—Ursula

cards.name: Magic Golden Flower
cards.cardText:
HEALING POLLEN Banish this item — Remove up to 3 damage from chosen character.

"Once upon a time, a single drop of sunlight fell from the heavens...."
—Flynn Rider

cards.name: Scepter of Arendelle
cards.cardText: COMMAND {E} — Chosen character gains Support this turn. (Whenever they quest, you may add their {S} to another chosen character's {S} this turn.)

cards.name: Aladdin
cards.cardText:
"Oh ho! So the street rat found a sword and a backbone!"
—Razoul

cards.name: Beast
cards.cardText:
BREAK When you play this character, you may banish chosen item.

"She'll never see me as anything... but a monster."

cards.name: Captain Hook
cards.cardText:
DOUBLE THE POWDER! When you play this character, you may return an action card named Fire the Cannons! from your discard to your hand.

"A pretty sight, Mr. Smee. We'll pot 'em like sitting ducks."

cards.name: Captain Hook
cards.cardText:
Challenger +2 (While challenging, this character gets +2 {S}.)

He loves to make light of a foe's predicament.

cards.name: Captain Hook
cards.cardText:
Shift 3 (You may pay 3 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Captain Hook.)
Challenger +3 (While challenging, this character gets +3 {S}.)
STOLEN DUST Characters with cost 3 or less can't challenge this character.

cards.name: Cerberus
cards.cardText: Always vigilant. Always fierce. Always fighting over the ball.

cards.name: Donald Duck
cards.cardText:
Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)
STAY ALERT! During your turn, your Musketeer characters gain Evasive. (They can challenge characters with Evasive.)

cards.name: Gantu
cards.cardText:
UNDER ARREST Characters with cost 2 or less can't challenge your characters.

"Relax, enjoy the trip... and don't get any ideas!"

cards.name: Goons
cards.cardText: They may be useless, but they came with the castle.

cards.name: Hans
cards.cardText:
STAGE A LITTLE ACCIDENT Whenever this character quests, you may deal 1 damage to chosen character.

Tired of being last, he decided to cut the line.

cards.name: Hercules
cards.cardText:
Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)

"You gotta admit, that was pretty heroic."

cards.name: Kristoff
cards.cardText:
Kristoff: "You want to talk about a supply and demand problem? I sell ice for a living."
Anna: "Ooh, that's a rough business to be in right now. I mean, that is really—ah, mm. That's unfortunate."

cards.name: Kronk
cards.cardText: "Oh yeah. It's all coming together!"

cards.name: Lilo
cards.cardText: "Space. That's where aliens come from. And also tourists!"

cards.name: Maui
cards.cardText: When the gods gift you a boat, you take it. The boat's owner is optional.

cards.name: Mickey Mouse
cards.cardText:
Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)
ALL FOR ONE Your other Musketeer characters get +1 {S}.

cards.name: Prince Eric
cards.cardText:
Challenger +2 (While challenging, this character gets +2 {S}.)

"I lost her once! I'm not gonna lose her again!"

cards.name: Simba
cards.cardText:
GUESS WHAT? When you play this character, you may draw a card, then choose and discard a card.

"I'm gonna be the best king the Pride Lands have ever seen!"

cards.name: Simba
cards.cardText:
Challenger +4 (While challenging, this character gets +4 {S}.)
POUNCE During your turn, this character gains Evasive. (They can challenge characters with Evasive.)

"I'll do whatever it takes to save my kingdom."

cards.name: Simba
cards.cardText:
I KNOW WHAT I HAVE TO DO During your turn, whenever this character banishes another character in a challenge, you gain 1 lore.

"I can't hide anymore. It's time to accept my destiny."

cards.name: Starkey
cards.cardText:
AYE AYE, CAPTAIN While you have a Captain character in play, this character gets +1 {L}.

A pirate must be tough, loyal, and strong. "Smart" doesn't even make the list.

cards.name: Te Kā
cards.cardText:
SEEK THE HEART During your turn, whenever this character banishes another character in a challenge, you gain 2 lore.

Maui: "Ever defeat a lava monster?"
Moana: "No. Have you?"

cards.name: Tinker Bell
cards.cardText:
Shift 4 (You may pay 4 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Tinker Bell.)
ROCK THE BOAT When you play this character, deal 1 damage to each opposing character.
PUNY PIRATE! During your turn, whenever this character banishes another character in a challenge, you may deal 2 damage to chosen opposing character.

cards.name: Tinker Bell
cards.cardText:
BATTLE PLANS {E} — Draw a card, then choose and discard a card.

Sometimes all you need is a little tactical genius.

cards.name: A Whole New World
cards.cardText:
(A character with cost 5 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.)
Each player discards their hand and draws 7 cards.

Shining, shimmering, splendid...

cards.name: Break
cards.cardText:
Banish chosen item.

No one throws a tantrum like a beast.

cards.name: Fire the Cannons!
cards.cardText:
Deal 2 damage to chosen character.

Captain Hook: "Double the powder and shorten the fuse!"
Mr. Smee: "Shorten the powder and double the fuse!"

cards.name: Grab Your Sword
cards.cardText:
(A character with cost 5 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.)
Deal 2 damage to each opposing character.

We don't like
What we don't understand
In fact, it scares us

cards.name: Ransack
cards.cardText:
Draw 2 cards, then choose and discard 2 cards.

Who has time to read labels?

cards.name: Smash
cards.cardText:
Deal 3 damage to chosen character.

"Go away!"

cards.name: Beast's Mirror
cards.cardText:
SHOW ME {E}, 3 {I} — If you have no cards in your hand, draw a card.

Ashamed of his monstrous form, the Beast concealed himself inside his castle, with a magic mirror as his only window to the outside world.

cards.name: Frying Pan
cards.cardText:
CLANG! Banish this item — Chosen character can't challenge during their next turn.

It's a fine piece of cookware, but as a weapon it's truly stunning.

cards.name: Musketeer Tabard
cards.cardText:
ALL FOR ONE AND ONE FOR ALL Whenever one of your characters with Bodyguard is banished, you may draw a card.

There's no such thing as a lone musketeer.

cards.name: Plasma Blaster
cards.cardText:
QUICK SHOT {E}, 2 {I} — Deal 1 damage to chosen character.

"You don't have to say 'pew pew' when you use it, but it doesn't hurt."
—Lilo, galactic hero

cards.name: Hades
cards.cardText:
Shift 6 (You may pay 6 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Hades.)
SINISTER PLOT This character gets +1 {L} for each other Villain character you have in play.

cards.name: Stitch
cards.cardText: OHANA When you play this character, if you have 2 or more other characters in play, you may draw 2 cards.

cards.name: Elsa
cards.cardText:
Shift 6 (You may pay 6 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Elsa.)
DEEP FREEZE When you play this character, exert up to 2 chosen characters. They can't ready at the start of their next turn.

cards.name: Mickey Mouse
cards.cardText:
ANIMATE BROOM You pay 1 {I} less to play Broom characters.
CEASELESS WORKER Whenever one of your Broom characters is banished in a challenge, you may return that card to your hand.

cards.name: Genie
cards.cardText:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
DISAPPEAR When you play this character, you may return chosen character to their player's hand.

cards.name: Mickey Mouse
cards.cardText:
Shift 5 (You may pay 5 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Mickey Mouse.)
MISDIRECTION Whenever you play an action, chosen opposing character can't quest during their next turn.

cards.name: Aladdin
cards.cardText:
Shift 5 (You may pay 5 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Aladdin.)
DARING EXPLOIT During your turn, whenever this character banishes another character in a challenge, you gain 2 lore and each opponent loses 2 lore.

cards.name: Maui
cards.cardText:
Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.)
Reckless (This character can't quest and must challenge each turn if able.)

cards.name: Aurora
cards.cardText:
Shift 3 (You may pay 3 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Aurora.)
PROTECTIVE EMBRACE Your other characters gain Ward. (Opponents can't choose them except to challenge.)

cards.name: Belle
cards.cardText:
READ A BOOK During your turn, you may put an additional card from your hand into your inkwell facedown.
MY FAVORITE PART! While you have 10 or more cards in your inkwell, this character gets +4 {L}.

cards.name: Simba
cards.cardText:
Challenger +4 (When challenging, this character gets +4 {S}.)
POUNCE During your turn, this character gains Evasive. (They can challenge characters with Evasive.)

cards.name: Tinker Bell
cards.cardText:
Shift 4 (You may pay 4 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Tinker Bell.)
ROCK THE BOAT When you play this character, deal 1 damage to each opposing character.
PUNY PIRATE! During your turn, whenever this character banishes another character in a challenge, you may deal 2 damage to chosen opposing character.
